about_the_game:
Tarogue is a captivating roguelike deck builder about gathering spirits to create powerful chain-reactions.

In Tarogue you will...

  • Establish your deck of specters, spirits and spooks by gathering cards.
  • Experience the deep ambiance as you journey solemnly to the heart of Winter.
  • Explore the satisfying synergies of hard-hitting combos, sneaky strategies and much more!

DISCOVER SYNERGIES

Craft your deck with care, discovering the intricate synergies that lie within. Every card you choose shapes your journey, offering endless possibilities and strategic depth.

UNCOVER THE SECRETS

In the never-ending battle between the four seasons - Winter is suddenly eclipsing everything. It's up to fight the sinister cabal of snow.
And darker plots are yet to be revealed...

ENDLESS REPLAYABILITY

Each playthrough offers a fresh and exciting experience, with new cards, secrets, and challenges to uncover. Test your skills and adapt to ever-changing circumstances as you strive to conquer the mystical realm.

name: Tarogue
short_description: Tarogue is an otherworldly, card-based journey set in the nordic plains. You are The Apprentice. Traverse the winterclad wilds and bring back balance between the four seasons. Craft your deck, discover synergies, and find artifacts as you embark on this spellbinding adventure!
